name: Five Nights at Freddy's GB
description:
"Hello? Hello, hello?

I wanted to record this message to tell you about FNAF GB, it's a uh, a video game based on those old Freddy Fazbear pizza places from way back.

So we uh, we found an old GameBoy cartridge covered in dust while clearing out one of the old locations. I can't find anything online about a tie-in game from the 90s, so I guess this was a prototype or something?  

I mean, I can see why they never realised this thing, it - it's hardly very appropriate for young fans of Freddy's is it?

Uh, I thought I'd upload the ROM I extracted here for anyone who wants to take a look for themselves. 

Just uh, try to avoid playing it at night. N-not that that will affect anything, that's not what I meant. Just that uh, screens late at night y'know? Bad for the eyes... yeah, bad for the eyes...

See you on the flip-side."

Fnaf GB is a fanmade demake of the original Five Nights at Freddy's game. It was made using GB Studio, the downloadable ROM file should be compatible with GameBoy emulators and flash carts. 

All credit for the original game goes to Scott Cawthon.

Z / J keys - A button

X / K keys - B button

WASD / Arrow keys - D Pad

Enter - Start Button
